theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.NAME: Unshackling
theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

theUnchainedMod:Whiplash.NAME: Whiplash
theUnchainedMod:Whiplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses !M! HP.

theUnchainedMod:HeartfeltSpeech.NAME: Heartfelt Speech
theUnchainedMod:HeartfeltSpeech.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:ArcaneCharm.NAME: Arcane Charm
theUnchainedMod:ArcaneCharm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay.

theUnchainedMod:FullSwing.NAME: Full Swing
theUnchainedMod:FullSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:QuickSwing.NAME: Quick Swing
theUnchainedMod:QuickSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Draw !M! cards.

theUnchainedMod:StepBack.NAME: Step Back
theUnchainedMod:StepBack.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain !B! Block.
theUnchainedMod:StepBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain !B! Block.

theUnchainedMod:MasterworkGlyph.NAME: Masterwork Glyph
theUnchainedMod:MasterworkGlyph.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. If you do not have Block, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay again.

theUnchainedMod:PropheticSwing.NAME: Prophetic Swing
theUnchainedMod:PropheticSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Scry !M!.

theUnchainedMod:TetheredMind.NAME: Tethered Mind
theUnchainedMod:TetheredMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. NL Whenever you take damage or damage is blocked by theunchainedmod:Relay, the enemy loses the same amount of HP. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Liberation.NAME: Liberation
theUnchainedMod:Liberation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Finish ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains. NL Remove ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:GlyphBeam.NAME: Glyph Beam
theUnchainedMod:GlyphBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you gain theunchainedmod:Relay, a random enemy takes !D! damage. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.NAME: Cruiserweight
theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a 2-cost card, draw 1 card.
theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a 2-cost card, draw 2 cards.

theUnchainedMod:Kusarigama.NAME: Kusarigama
theUnchainedMod:Kusarigama.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if it finishes an Attack theunchainedmod:Chain. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need to finish an Attack Chain with this.

theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2-cost card is played twice.
theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 2-cost cards are played twice.

theUnchainedMod:RazorChain.NAME: Razor Chain
theUnchainedMod:RazorChain.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !D! HP. If the Enemy has Block, Enemy loses !D! HP again. HP loss is affected by theunchainedmod:Damage_Modifiers.

theUnchainedMod:GuardedPosture.NAME: Guarded Posture
theUnchainedMod:GuardedPosture.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you finish a Chain, gain !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:FractalShield.NAME: Fractal Shield
theUnchainedMod:FractalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. theunchainedmod:Relay now blocks theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.
theUnchainedMod:FractalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. theunchainedmod:Relay now blocks theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and HP Loss.

theUnchainedMod:Windup.NAME: Windup
theUnchainedMod:Windup.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Add a random common Attack to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn NL and exhausts.
theUnchainedMod:Windup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Add a random upgraded common Attack to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn NL and exhausts.

theUnchainedMod:APlomb.NAME: À Plomb
theUnchainedMod:APlomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL Next Turn, gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:Swirl.NAME: Swirl
theUnchainedMod:Swirl.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Double the base damage and Block of ALL *Swirls this turn. Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Swirl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Double the base damage and Block of ALL *Swirls this turn. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:RoyalDecree.NAME: Royal Decree
theUnchainedMod:RoyalDecree.DESCRIPTION: Add a random 2-cost card into your hand. NL It costs !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Claustrophobia.NAME: Claustrophobia
theUnchainedMod:Claustrophobia.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor to ALL enemies.
theUnchainedMod:Claustrophobia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, apply !M! theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:SolarPlexus.NAME: Solar Plexus
theUnchainedMod:SolarPlexus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !M! theunchainedmod:Chain: theunchainedmod:Stun the same enemy. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:RelentlessMovements.NAME: Relentless Movements
theUnchainedMod:RelentlessMovements.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:Burnish.NAME: Burnish
theUnchainedMod:Burnish.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Gain theunchainedmod:Momentum equal to double its cost.

theUnchainedMod:SharePain.NAME: Share Pain
theUnchainedMod:SharePain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you have gained this combat.
theUnchainedMod:SharePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you have gained this combat.

theUnchainedMod:Overexertion.NAME: Overexertion
theUnchainedMod:Overexertion.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Overexertion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Ballet.NAME: Ballet
theUnchainedMod:Ballet.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL *Swirls now hit ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:WideSwing.NAME: Wide Swing
theUnchainedMod:WideSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain end your turn.

theUnchainedMod:SingleOut.NAME: Single Out
theUnchainedMod:SingleOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL A random enemy gains !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:RelentlessOnslaught.NAME: Relentless Onslaught
theUnchainedMod:RelentlessOnslaught.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Reapply this theunchainedmod:Chain. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Refresh.NAME: Refresh
theUnchainedMod:Refresh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. NL Remove ALL your theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and gain theunchainedmod:Relay equal to the amount you removed.

theUnchainedMod:RoyalAssessment.NAME: Royal Assessment
theUnchainedMod:RoyalAssessment.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every enemy that has Block.
theUnchainedMod:RoyalAssessment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] if ALL enemies have Block and [E] for every enemy that has Block.

theUnchainedMod:Cocoon.NAME: Cocoon
theUnchainedMod:Cocoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. Your theunchainedmod:Relay does not wear off at the start of next turn.

theUnchainedMod:GlyphSwing.NAME: Glyph Swing
theUnchainedMod:GlyphSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Remove ALL your theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and deal damage equal to the amount you removed.

theUnchainedMod:Baguazhang.NAME: Baguazhang
theUnchainedMod:Baguazhang.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy gains 5 Block. NL If the enemy intends to do less than !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! damage (per hit), gain !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:MagusForm.NAME: Magus Form
theUnchainedMod:MagusForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a 2-cost card, gain [E].
theUnchainedMod:MagusForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 2-cost card, gain [E].

theUnchainedMod:TelekineticPulse.NAME: Telekinetic Pulse
theUnchainedMod:TelekineticPulse.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block and lose !M! HP. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: ALL enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block, lose !M! HP. Reapply this theunchainedmod:Chain. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:TieDown.NAME: Tie Down
theUnchainedMod:TieDown.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this and next turn. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:ThePrincesGrace.NAME: The Prince's Grace
theUnchainedMod:ThePrincesGrace.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, draw !M! additional card. ALL enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block every turn.
theUnchainedMod:ThePrincesGrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, draw !M! additional cards. ALL enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block every turn.

theUnchainedMod:Cuff.NAME: Cuff
theUnchainedMod:Cuff.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Weak. NL 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
theUnchainedMod:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have spent ALL your [E] at the end of this turn, gain [E] [E] next turn.
theUnchainedMod:Premonition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have spent ALL your [E] at the end of this turn, gain NL [E] [E] [E] next turn.

theUnchainedMod:Pirouette.NAME: Pirouette
theUnchainedMod:Pirouette.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Swirl into your hand. NL Upgrade ALL *Swirls in your hand. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:TradeOffer.NAME: Trade Offer
theUnchainedMod:TradeOffer.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Block. NL Draw !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! card.
theUnchainedMod:TradeOffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Block. NL Draw !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! cards.

theUnchainedMod:FouettéEnTournant.NAME: Fouetté En Tournant
theUnchainedMod:FouettéEnTournant.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum X times. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Ceasefire.NAME: Ceasefire
theUnchainedMod:Ceasefire.DESCRIPTION: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Ceasefire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:Suffocate.NAME: Suffocate
theUnchainedMod:Suffocate.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the enemies Block. NL Enemy loses HP equal to their Block.

theUnchainedMod:ThreadOfAriadne.NAME: Thread Of Ariadne
theUnchainedMod:ThreadOfAriadne.DESCRIPTION: If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need an active Chain to play this.

theUnchainedMod:LawOfInertia.NAME: Law Of Inertia
theUnchainedMod:LawOfInertia.DESCRIPTION: The first time you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain each turn, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. If you did not finish a theunchainedmod:Chain by the end of turn, lose !M! Strength and Dexterity.

theUnchainedMod:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
theUnchainedMod:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Lose ALL your [E]. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:ChainSaw.NAME: Chain Saw
theUnchainedMod:ChainSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Delete ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains. Increase this card's damage by !M! for every theunchainedmod:Chain deleted this combat.

theUnchainedMod:ReinforcedLink.NAME: Reinforced Link
theUnchainedMod:ReinforcedLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

theUnchainedMod:Prophecy.NAME: Prophecy
theUnchainedMod:Prophecy.DESCRIPTION: Copy a card in your hand and put the copy on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Prophecy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy a card in your hand twice and put both copies on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
theUnchainedMod:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:HeavyHitter.NAME: Heavy Hitter
theUnchainedMod:HeavyHitter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength. Whenever you hit an enemy this turn, apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

theUnchainedMod:GraspFuture.NAME: Grasp Future
theUnchainedMod:GraspFuture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put !M! card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.

theUnchainedMod:DoubleDown.NAME: Double Down
theUnchainedMod:DoubleDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Counts as a card for any theunchainedmod:Chain.

theUnchainedMod:EyeForAnEye.NAME: Eye For An Eye
theUnchainedMod:EyeForAnEye.DESCRIPTION: If you have theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage, NL gain !M! Strength. NL Remove ALL your theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.

theUnchainedMod:DefensiveLink.NAME: Defensive Link
theUnchainedMod:DefensiveLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Reduce the cost of a card in your hand by 1 this turn.

theUnchainedMod:ChaseDestiny.NAME: Chase Destiny
theUnchainedMod:ChaseDestiny.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E]. Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:ChaseDestiny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This and next turn, whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E]. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:StareDown.NAME: Stare Down
theUnchainedMod:StareDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Weak to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:ArcaneTransmutation.NAME: Arcane Transmutation
theUnchainedMod:ArcaneTransmutation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Block, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay.

theUnchainedMod:Cripple.NAME: Cripple
theUnchainedMod:Cripple.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor. Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Weak. NL Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:OffhandedSwing.NAME: Offhanded Swing
theUnchainedMod:OffhandedSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card, if it is a 2-cost card play it on the same enemy if possible.

theUnchainedMod:Haste.NAME: Haste
theUnchainedMod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, if it gives you theunchainedmod:Momentum, draw another card. NL Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Momentum.
theUnchainedMod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, if it gives you theunchainedmod:Momentum, play it and draw another card. NL Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:ImmovableObject.NAME: Immovable Object
theUnchainedMod:ImmovableObject.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, the attacking enemy gains !M! theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

theUnchainedMod:Taxes.NAME: Taxes
theUnchainedMod:Taxes.DESCRIPTION: Rightfully acquire !M! Gold from every enemy.

theUnchainedMod:RetreatingSwing.NAME: Retreating Swing
theUnchainedMod:RetreatingSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

theUnchainedMod:MakeHaste.NAME: Make Haste
theUnchainedMod:MakeHaste.DESCRIPTION: Play as many cards from the top of your draw pile as you have *Swirls.

theUnchainedMod:MagicMecha.NAME: Magic Mecha
theUnchainedMod:MagicMecha.DESCRIPTION: !M! theunchainedmod:Master_Chain: Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Strength, !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Dexterity and !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Arcane_Mastery.

theUnchainedMod:BarbedWire.NAME: Barbed Wire
theUnchainedMod:BarbedWire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL Enemies for each theunchainedmod:Chain not finished at the end of your turn.

theUnchainedMod:ArcaneArtillery.NAME: Arcane Artillery
theUnchainedMod:ArcaneArtillery.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your theunchainedmod:Relay.
theUnchainedMod:ArcaneArtillery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your theunchainedmod:Relay to ALL Enemies.

theUnchainedMod:ChainFlourish.NAME: Chain Flourish
theUnchainedMod:ChainFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each theunchainedmod:Chain you have finished this combat.

theUnchainedMod:CrushPlates.NAME: Crush Plates
theUnchainedMod:CrushPlates.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply as much theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor as was blocked by the Enemy.

theUnchainedMod:SwordOfDamocles.NAME: Sword Of Damocles
theUnchainedMod:SwordOfDamocles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Master_Chain: Lose !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! HP and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:MeltingHex.NAME: Melting Hex
theUnchainedMod:MeltingHex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor and !M! theunchainedmod:Malleable. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:ArcaneLink.NAME: Arcane Link
theUnchainedMod:ArcaneLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relay. NL If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain, gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Arcane_Mastery.
